Description.Text:
Position The Prestige hotel is located in San Giuliano of Rimini, about 70 from the beach.
Restaurant Air-conditioned restaurant.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Last refurbishment on 2006.
Sweet and salad buffet breakfast. RESTAURANT:
WINTER SEASON from 29/09/2013 to 23/05/2014 dinner with fixed menu, 3 courses with fruit or dessert. HALF BOARD ON REQUEST. TO REQUIRE IN THE MOMENT OF BOOKING.
SUMMER SEASON from 24/05/2014 to 27/09/2014 The dinner offers 2 choise menu, vegetables buffet, fruits or dessert. FOR WHO BOOKS FULL BAORD: DINNER SERVED IN HOTEL'S RESTAURANT. LUNCHE SERVED IN A RESTAURANT OUTSIDE THE HOTEL, AT 200, WITH CHOICE BETWEEN 2 MENUS WITH 1/2 L OF WATER PER PERSON PER LUNCH.
Credit card accepted: Eurocard, Mastercard and Visa.
ARRIVAL & DEPARTURE: check in: 12.00 (midday) - check out: 10.00 am.
